name: Blade Halo

components.m: one miniature blade worth 5gp for each blade you summon

entries: A circle of four shimmering blades appears in your space, spinning around your body. The blades follow you if you move. As a bonus action on your turn, you can hurl one of the blades at a target within range. Make a ranged spell attack, on a hit the target takes {@dice 2d8} magical slashing damage. The blade is then destroyed. You can instead of hurling the blade, grasp it, and make a melee spell attack which does {@dice 2d10} magical slashing damage on hit. For each blade remaining creatures that end their turn within 5ft of you take {@dice 1d4} magical slashing.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: If you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level slot, you summon one additional blade.
